portfolio.title: Tempo
portfolio.description: An AI-driven app designed to help users categorize their thoughts and experiences into distinct life areas. Tempo offers personalized feedback and actionable insights to enhance emotional well-being and promote self-awareness.

portfolio.title: Rellow
portfolio.description: An innovative real estate platform powered by advanced AI technology. Rellow simplifies the process of finding properties, enabling users to make data-driven investment decisions efficiently.
